Class Account

java.lang.Object
Account
Direct Known Subclasses:
Checking, Credit, Saving
public class Account extends Object
The Account class represents a bank account associated with a customer. It contains information about the customer, checking account, savings account, and credit account.
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Juan Moreno, Javier Ontiveros
